## Density Plots by Condition

```{r density-effects-condition, include = TRUE}
for (cond in conditions){
  density_plot <- ggplot(density_long %>% 
                         filter(type == cond), 
                       aes(x = estimate, y = term, fill = group)) + 
  geom_density_ridges(alpha = 0.7, scale = 0.9) + 
  facet_grid(invariant ~ type_estimate) + 
  theme_classic() + 
  xlab("Estimated Score") + 
  ylab("Parameter") + 
  scale_fill_discrete(name = "Group") + 
    ggtitle(paste0(cond, " Graph Results"))

print(density_plot)
}
```
